title: First children`s book on alternative currency

title: Senate will discuss potentials and threats of digital currency
body: The US Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs has considered making a hearing into digital currencies.
keywords: senate discus potential threat digital currency

title: The first bitcoin ATM managed $100,000 worth transactions in a week
body: On Tuesday morning 29th of October in Vancouver, Canada the world's first Bitcoin – ATM started its work in Waves Coffee Shop. Now it is much easier to buy or sell popular digital currency a by cash.
keywords: first bitcoin atm managed worth transaction week

title: Bitcoin ransom to CryptoLocker malware
body: CryptoLocker malware takes computer and documents “in hostage” by encrypting users data. In order to decrypt this information malware charges a ransom in fiat or bitcoin currency.
keywords: bitcoin ransom cryptolocker malware

title: US ‘Subway’ sandwich shop accept bitcoins
body: Last week we have published information that Subway sandwich shop in Moscow, Russia is now accepting payment by bitcoin.
keywords: u subway sandwich shop accept bitcoins

title: MiiCard reduces the time in buying bitcoins
body: Over the past six months miiCard has been admired by a few bitcoin companies, which are interested in easier and faster way people could buy and sell bitcoins.
keywords: miicard reduces time buying bitcoins

title: Bitcoin prices continue to climb up.
body: Bitcoin becomes more recognizable to the new customers day by day. The growth of its popularity around the world and increasing number of payment has raised the price of virtual currency to record levels.
keywords: bitcoin price continue climb

title: Famous Brazilian magazine increases bitcoin popularity

title: Absolute Bitcoin Price Record Reaches $300

title: Bitcoin in India: Drivers and Barriers to Adoption

title: Western Union is not yet ready for bitcoin international transfer
body: During the Western Union Consumer Protection & Compliance Conference 2013 on 16th-18th of September, its executives gave a presentation that said it wasn’t yet suitable for international money transfer.
keywords: western union yet ready bitcoin international transfer

title: 75 years in prison for a founder of digital currency service Liberty Reserve
body: On Thursday, 31st of October, 41-year-old Vladimir Kats, Brooklyn, New York issued a plea at a federal court before US district judge Denise L. Cote. Kats may receive the maximum sentence for each charge, which will lead him to a 75 years imprisoned.
keywords: year prison founder digital currency service liberty reserve

title: Bitcoin changing banking system
body: Old banking system is getting even older day by day. New payment opportunities from PayPal, Google and others leave banks far behind.
keywords: bitcoin changing banking system

title: First Bitcoin ATM in Vancouver Coffee House
body: The first Bitcoin ATM now is awailable in Waves Coffee House in Vancouver, Canada. On Tuesday 29th of October startup  Robocoin  (based in Las Vegas) has partnered with Canadian Bitcoiniacs and made an important step to legitimate bitcoin currency and increase its popularity in Canada.

title: Australian photography studio offers 50% discount for bitcoin customers

body: New kind of digital currency has been making its steps “into the world”, called Bitcoin. Bitcoin was founded in 2009 by Satoshi Nakamoto. The founder prefers to be unrecognised.

title: First Lamassu Bitcoin ATM.
body: This October the company Lamassu confirmed that it shipped the first bitcoin ATM, which buy and sell bitcoins on their bitcoin wallet. A customer in Atlanta, Georgia got the first Lamassu machine.
keywords: first lamassu bitcoin atm

title: Closed by FBI "Silk Road" website has “reborn”
body: Latest FBI reports say that a new anonymous online marketplace, trading illegal drugs was launched on this Wednesday. Nevertheless it has the same name and is designed just like the first Silk Road website, which was closed by US regulators and law enforcements just a month ago.
keywords: closed fbi silk road website “ reborn ”

title: KnCMiner finished production of Jupiter bitcoin mining rigs
body: The Sweden-based company KnCMiner has has already started shipping Jupiter bitcoin mining rigs to its customers. Now we can be acquainted with Jupiter rigs via Youtube, amused by its sufficient power.
keywords: kncminer finished production jupiter bitcoin mining rig
